requirement: Have you identified internal & external issues that will impact on your Occupational Health & Safety Management System (OH&SMS), including Climate Change?
Have you identified interested parties & which stakeholder requirements will be addressed through the OH&SMS, including requirements relating to Climate Change?
Have you determined and documented the scope and boundaries of the OH&SMS?
Can your organisation demonstrate that top management is providing leadership and commitment to the OH&SMS?
Have you established and documented an Occupational Health & Safety Policy?
Has management assigned roles and responsibilities for the OH&SMS’s implementation, operation, performance reporting?
Has the organisation established a process for consultation and participation of workers at all functions in the development of the OH&SMS?
Have you established a plan to address identified risks and opportunities related to the OH&SMS?
Have you established a documented risk assessment process that considers internal and external issues and the needs and expectations of interested parties relevant to the organisation?
Have you established a process for the identification of hazards, OH&S risks and risks to the OH&SMS?
Have you established a process for determining its applicable and relevant legal and other requirements?
Have you established and documented measurable OH&S objectives?
Have you established plans to monitor, measure, communicate and achieve objectives and determined processes for maintaining related records?
Have you established processes to ensure changes to the OH&SMS are carried out in a planned manner?
Have you determined the resources needed to establish, implement, continuously improve and maintain the OH&SMS?
Have you determined and documented the competencies required by personnel to undertake their roles and responsibilities in compliance with the OH&SMS?
Do you retain documented records of competence (education, training experience, qualification)?
Have you established operating procedures, including criteria and implementation of process controls in accordance with criteria, as needed to ensure stakeholder requirements are met?
Have you established a process for the elimination of hazards and reduction of operational level risk?
Have you established change management procedures and processes for reviewing the consequences of unintended change?
Have you established a process for the management of contractor compliance to the organisation’s requirements?
Have you established process(es) for emergency response and preparedness, established emergency scenarios and tested their effectiveness?
Have you established processes and methods for monitoring, measuring, analysing and evaluating OH&SMS performance and effectiveness i.e., what, when, how, and by whom?
Have you determined how evidence will be preserved?
Have you evaluated its compliance with its compliance obligations?
Have you established a documented audit programme that defines timing, responsibilities, reporting, audit criteria and scope?
Have you established a process to ensure results and evidence of implementation of the internal audit program/process are documented and available?
Have you conducted internal audits to ensure that the organisation audits its own Environmental requirements and the requirements of the Standard?
Do you conduct and document regular management reviews of the EMS?
Do you have a process for recording and managing incidents and nonconformities, including initial correction, root cause and corrective actions?
Do you maintain the following mandatory documentation?
